name: Ampharos
author: Satoshi Shirai
flavor_text: The tail’s tip shines brightly and can be seen from far away. It acts as a beacon for lost people.

abilities.name: Unseen Flash
abilities.effect: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may put 2 {L} Energy cards from your hand in the Lost Zone. If you do, your opponent’s Active Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Split Bomb
attacks.effect: This attack does 50 damage to 2 of your opponent’s Pokémon. (Don’t apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)
